summary.span: 在网页上保留显示静态文本的位置。

span.span: Reserves a location on the Web page to display static text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件保留在网页上显示文本的位置。Use the control to reserve a location on the Web page to display text. 控件是类似于控件，除了控件不允许你将样式应用到显示的文本。The control is similar to the control, except the control does not allow you to apply a style to the displayed text. 你可以以编程方式控制通过设置在控件中显示的文本属性。You can programmatically control the text displayed in the control by setting the property. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用来显示用户输入，这可能包含恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端可执行的脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送在你的应用程序中显示它的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关安全性的详细信息，请参阅[保护标准控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8)，[如何： 保护对脚本利用在 Web 应用程序中进行应用 HTML 编码为字符串](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b)，和[验证用户输入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461)。For more information about security, see [Securing Standard Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3e7718f-63d0-44a3-bd5f-48cc2059c2a8), [How to: Protect Against Script Exploits in a Web Application by Applying HTML Encoding to Strings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f67973f-dda0-45a1-ba9d-e88532d7dc5b), and [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ad3dacb-89e0-4cee-89ac-40a3f2a85461). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用控件来显示静态文本。The following example demonstrates how to use the control to display static text. > [!NOTE] > 下面的示例使用单文件代码模型，且如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information about the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用属性来指定如何的内容应呈现控件。Use the property to specify how the contents of a control should be rendered. 此属性使用其中一个设置枚举值。This property is set using one of the enumeration values. 下表列出可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`PassThrough`|不会修改控件的内容。The contents of the control are not modified.| |`Encode`|控件的内容将转换为 HTML 编码的字符串。The contents of the control are converted to an HTML-encoded string.| |`Transform`|从控件的内容删除不受支持的标记语言元素。Unsupported markup-language elements are removed from the contents of the control. 如果控件是否呈现在浏览器支持 HTML 或 XHTML，不会修改控件的内容。If the control is rendered on a browser that supports HTML or XHTML, the control's contents are not modified.| 如果指定`PassThrough`的全部内容属性传递到设备或浏览器而无需进行任何修改。If you specify `PassThrough`, the entire contents of the property are passed to the device or browser without making any modifications. 例如，如果属性控件包含`
`标记，它将发送到所有设备和浏览器是否支持或不。For example, if the property of a control contains an `
` tag, it is sent to all devices and browsers whether it is supported or not. 如果指定`Encode`，有关内容属性转换为 HTML 编码的字符串在呈现之前。If you specify `Encode`, the contents for the property are converted into an HTML-encoded string before rendering. 例如，如果属性控件包含`
`标记，则它将转换为`<Hr>`并发送到设备或浏览器。For example, if the property of a control contains an `
` tag, it is converted to `<Hr>` and sent to the device or browser. 如果指定`Transform`的呈现行为属性取决于要呈现的标记类型。If you specify `Transform`, the rendering behavior of the property depends on the type of markup being rendered. 当控件呈现为设备或浏览器支持 HTML 或 XHTML，指定产生相同的行为指定。When the control is rendered for a device or browser that supports HTML or XHTML, specifying produces the same behavior as specifying . 所有标记标记和元素属性呈现到请求浏览器。All markup tags and elements for the property are rendered for the requesting browser. 当控件呈现为 HTML 或 XHTML，如 WML 或 cHTML 以外的标记语言，则可以使用以删除不受支持的标记元素的值。When the control is rendered for a markup language other than HTML or XHTML, such as WML or cHTML, you can use the value to remove unsupported markup elements. 在此情况下，任何标记的语言元素的中目标的标记语言不支持的属性不会呈现控件。In this case, any markup language elements of the property that are not supported in the targeted markup language are not rendered for the control. 例如，如果属性控件包含`

` tag, the tag is removed before the content is sent to a WML device. 如果不受支持的标记包含的内容，仅标记将被删除，并将内容发送到设备或浏览器。If an unsupported tag contains content, only the tag is removed and the content is sent to the device or browser. 例如，如果属性包含的内容`Test`、``和``标记被删除，而"Test"发送到设备或浏览器的文本。For example, if the property contains the content `Test`, the `` and `` tags are removed, and the text "Test" is sent to the device or browser. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置控件的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set a control's property. 属性最初设置为`Encode`中控件的声明性语法。The property is initially set to `Encode` in the declarative syntax for the control. 在页面加载后，用户可以单击一个按钮以设置属性`PassThrough`。After the page loads, the user can click a button to set the property to `PassThrough`. 这将导致的内容属性以不同的方式呈现。This causes the contents of the property to render differently. > [!NOTE] > 下面的示例使用单文件代码模型，且如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information about the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式更改中显示的标题控件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically change the caption displayed in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的示例使用单文件代码模型，且如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following example uses the single-file code model and might not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code example must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information about the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417).
